cohortName: SLE glomerulonephritis syndrome referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4285717) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: SLE glomerulonephritis syndrome referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4285717) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Nephrosis co-occurrent and due to systemic lupus erythematosus or Nephritis with Lupus erythematosus before at first diagnosis
logicDescription: 'Nephrosis co-occurrent and due to systemic lupus erythematosus' or 'Nephritis with Lupus erythematosus before' at first diagnosis

cohortName: Nephrosis co-occurrent and due to systemic lupus erythematosus at first diagnosis
logicDescription: 'Nephrosis co-occurrent and due to systemic lupus erythematosus' at first diagnosis
